title: Which song of Bollywood is copied from other language? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are so many bollywood songs that are very well copied from English songs and you didn't noticed. OK so here are some of the popular bollywood songs. Bulleya(Ae dil Hai muskil) One of the biggest success of Karan Johar starring Ranbeer Kapoor and Aishwarya Rai bachhan. This music was totally copied from Papa Roach- last resort. If you listen to the music, you will found no difference.  2) Nashe si Chad gyi (Befikre) It was a one of the popular romantic songs of 2016. Although the movie was not a big hit but this song find a corner in people heart  This was taken from the amine JunJuo Romantic OST Track No. 1  3) Pehli Nazar main(Race) This is one of my favorite from Atif Album. This movie came in 2008 starring Saif Ali khan, Katrina and more.  This melodious song is a carbon copy of South Korean song called Sarang HaeYo-Kim Hyung  4) Khallas(Veerappan) The creators of this make one of the biggest worst of 21st century. Directed by Ram Gopal Verma and Item song performed by ZarinE khan in 2016.  Originality of this song is “Get low” by Dj Snake and Dillon Francis. As it becomes trends of bollywood to ruin the songs by recreating or by copying them.Many songs are more present which are totally copied or taken some of the tunes. Some of them are.KAHO NA PAAR HAI.AE DIL LAYA HAI BAHAR(KYA KAHANA)MUJHE NEEND NA AAYE(DIL)HARE RAM HARE RAM(BHOOL BHOLAIYA)

Though copying is something we don't appreciate alot but we can give some margin to our music directors because music has no language. So the songs are: Dhoom machale Dhoom taken from Mario takes a walk by Jesse Cook Pyar tune kya Kiya tiltle track taken from Exorcist 2: The Heretic Kya mujhe pyar hai from Tak Bisakah Pal pal from The Theme of a Dream Kambakth Ishq from Eireann Sikdum taken from Sikidim Dil Na Diya from Turkish Military March track Sochna kya from Los Kjarkas Ram Re from Bird boy Gela Gela from Thoia Thiong Dedi from Didi by milk and honey Hare Krishna hare Ram from Mr Lecon Pehli Nazar from Sarang Hae Dil samundar from kuzu kuzu Pretty woman taken from oh pretty woman Koi Yahaan Naache taken from Video killed by the radio star Chura Liya hai tumne taken from its Tuesday this must be Belgium Akele hain taken from The return to the Alemo Om Shanti Om of Karz taken from Om shanty Om Raja Ko Rani se pyar ho gaya taken Godfather theme Mehbooba Mehbooba taken from Ta Rialia In Dino Dil Mera matches with Mera naam hai Mohabbat These are the songs I know
